item.title: About
item.description:
Iâ€™m a graduate from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute with bachelor’s degree in Computer & Systems Engineering and Computer Science. I currently work for Cimpress, particularly on automation, deployment, infrastructure, and service discovery.

Working towards making people’s lives easier, one line at a time.
